title: @Riot OCE, we simply don't have thew playerbase to sustain Normals + ARAM + Ranked + RGM 24/7
body:
Please stop subjecting us to not being able to find quality games for a month at at time every time you shit out an event. The OCE playerbase simply can't sustain that many queues without severely compromising the quality of matchmaking (specifically during the typical school/work day).

Please, disable RGMs 9-5/9-3 or make them weekend-only.

You guys quote the statistic EVERY DAMN YEAR that a substantial number of people stop playing the game after (AR)URF has been out for a few days and it takes up to a month for them to come back. And every year you still release this god awful gamemode for way too long.
